Package de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.preprocessing

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseDoc
    Central class of the preprocessing package.
    BoldAnnotater  
    BookSplitter
    Tries to divides entire books provided as PDFs according to the "Table of contents"(TOC) and a page offset, pointing to the numerical page of the pdf at which the first mentioned article of the TOC starts.
    DHQXMLParser
    Class to process the XML documents of the DHQ.
    Divider
    Class to split scientific papers into the three parts.
    DividerTest  
    FolderReader
    Class to read all files of a folder and preprocess them, aka create BaseDocs.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NotSupportedFormatException
    Exception to notify that the format of an input file is not supported.
